item.title: TikTok Restoring Service for U.S. Users, After Trump Signals He Will Save It
item.description: The president-elect said he will issue an executive order, and the app said it will work on a long-term solution with the incoming administration.

item.title: How People Actually Make a Living on TikTok
item.description: The platform has provided a surge in discovery and revenue for companies that may not be able to replicate it elsewhere.
